name: Searching For Rest
description:
When you died your body could not be found, a funeral was held and an empty casket was lowered into your grave. Many years later your soul has brought you back from death to finally find eternal rest.

50+ Unlocks
Advance your Necropolis and unlock game altering upgrades as you play. Discover Curses that influence your gameplay in different ways.



Strategic Gameplay
Fight fearsome foes and gain unique abilities each time you venture through the cemetery. Uncover the mystery of your unending search and fight powerful bosses in the Catacombs.

Deckbuilding and Upgrades
Create the perfect graveyard and obtain powerful upgrades on your search for rest. Mix and match different upgrades each time you play to create unstoppable builds.
